title: Calories in String Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in string cheese per stick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) mozzarella string cheese stick, made from pasteurized milk, mild flavor, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, milk type, portion size, and added flavors; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One string cheese stick has ~80 kcal and ~7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one string cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for a standard 1 oz mozzarella stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in string cheese?
faqs.a: Roughly 7 g protein per stick, making it a good snack.
Very lowâ€”only 1 g carbs per stick, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Is string cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 200 mg per stick; watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in string cheese?
faqs.a: Brands vary by 10-20 kcal per stick due to milk fat content and additives.
